start: ^You walk into the rec room and are immediately confronted with a ghastly scene.
options: ^A body lays on the floor of the recreation room beside the pool table. Blood has discolored the carpet.
^A few people are standing in the hallway, gaping in through the rec room's window.
examine: ^It appears to be a man in his 20s, wearing a Good People Brewing shirt and blue jeans. His face is pressed down into the floor.
^A flash of metal catches your eye from underneath the pool table.
